keyPolicies.policyDescription: Defending our public services and protecting our green spaces.
Standing up for local people, fighting for our businesses and jobs.

mentions.candidate: I've been a strong voice for this area but I need your support to be re-elected as your Labour MP.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Theresa May's Tory Government is taking a hammer to public services.

issues.brexitEurope: The Brexit result was clear, and I accept it.
issues.health: As a local doctor, I've witnessed the effects of Tory underfunding and privatisation of our NHS. Angela is the only credible candidate in this election pledging to protect our vital health service.
issues.socialWelfare: If you've worked all your life you should not fear retirement. Tory plans to scrap the 'Triple Lock' which Labour pledges to protect shows only a vote for Angela can protect the state pension.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a local candidate who lives in the constituency, the place I have chosen to raise my family, it has been an honour and a privilege to represent you as your Member of Parliament.

endorsements.endorsement: As a local doctor I've witnessed the effects of Tory underfunding and privatisation of our NHS. Angela is the only credible candidate in this election pledging to protect our vital health service.
If you've worked all your life you should not fear retirement. Tory plans to scrap the 'Triple Lock' which Labour pledges to protect shows only a vote for Angela can protect the state pension.
I want my children to be able to go to University. Labour's plans to bring back maintenance grants will help them continue their education without worrying about money.

examples: Tory plans to scrap the 'Triple Lock'.
Angela is the only credible candidate in this election pledging to protect our vital health service.
Local GP services are being stretched.
Schools forced to send begging letters to parents.
Real wages for local people down £1,110 per year.
Theresa May's Tory Government is taking a hammer to public services.

personalStories.story: I am proud of my record of standing up for local people.
